dict.string:
Liquid staking protocols allow users to earn staking rewards even without locking up their assets. Users can deposit tokens and receive tradable liquid tokens in return.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
Is there any risk from staking, like slashing or any penalties?

The only risk for stakers is missing out on rewards any time a validator they staked with is slashed. Slashing is a protocol-level penalty associated with a validator failure if it validates an invalid transaction or goes offline. The delegated staked token is not slashed — slashing impacts only the self-stake of the validator. Ankr only delegates to trusted and reputable validator nodes to avoid any validator that would act maliciously.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
What is the minimum and maximum amount of FTM I can stake?

The minimum amount to stake is 1 FTM, and there is no maximum cap on the amount of FTM you can stake.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
How do I receive my rewards?

aFTMb is a rebasing token. When holding aFTMb, your balance will increase in proportion to your FTM staking rewards. A rebase runs daily, and rewards occur each time this runs. So each day, you will see the quantity of your aFTMb increase by a small amount.


aFTMc is a reward-bearing token, meaning its quantity stays the same from the moment of staking. Instead, it appreciates in value, as the redemption ratio grows because of reward accumulation.
How long does it take to unstake FTM from Ankr?

You will receive the unstaked FTM after the unbonding period of up to 35 days.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
After unstaking, does my stake immediately stop accumulating rewards?

Yes, you will no longer accumulate any rewards after you have clicked on the ‘Unstake’ button.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
Is there any liquidity for my Liquid Staking tokens anywhere currently?

You can trade them in the listed liquidity pools on ANKR DeFi:

  • aFTMb

  • aFTMс

You can also use your liquid tokens to:

  • Provide liquidity to DEXs and earn from commissions taken when users swap tokens, using the liquidity pool you're a part of.

  • Yield farm and earn additional rewards in the form of other tokens.

Put your tokens in a vault and automatically earn additional rewards in the form of one of both assets from the pair.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
Does Ankr charge for the service?

When unstaking, users pay a burn fee that depends on the current liquidity and amount to unstake.

  • aETHb

  • aETHc
